thread.section_title: Splendid Etoile Hotel - UPDATED 2016 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice cosy hotel close to the Arc de Triumph
thread.title_full: Nice cosy hotel close to the Arc de Triumph - Review of Splendid Etoile Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Gopi C
title: Nice cosy hotel close to the Arc de Triumph
text:
Stayed at this hotel for over a week. Room was clean and well appointed. Looked to be recently remodeled too. Very close to the Champs Elysee and the Eiffel Tower
The only issue was the shower had a partial glass partition and water would always splash over to the floor . They really should change it to a full closed shower instead
Had extensive internet issues too... They had a shortage of licenses so guest had to wait until someone logged out
Annoying when you rely on it everywhere these days....
Concierge Mr Farouk was extremely helpful ... Staff and management were professional and courteous
Overall we like the hotel and will consider going back ...
